message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.DC 

This paper deals with the problem of energy efficiency in cellular heterogeneous networks (HetNets) using radio resource and power management combined with base station ON/OFF switching. This involves the management of network resources and optimization of power consumption, which are key areas of research in computer networks. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves optimization techniques and algorithms, which are relevant to the sub-category cs.IT (Information Theory). The use of base station ON/OFF switching and power management can be considered as control systems, which are relevant to the sub-category cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also involves the use of femtocell access points, which are relevant to the sub-category cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper deals with energy efficiency, which is relevant to the sub-category cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
